ModDNAString alphabet

Felix G.M. Ernst & Denis L.J. Lafontaine

2024-03-23

Source: vignettes/ModDNAString-alphabet.Rmd
ModDNAString-alphabet.Rmd

Abstract

Details on the DNA modification alphabet used by the Modstrings package

The alphabets for the modifications used in this package are based on the compilation of DNA modifications by the Hoffman lab (Sood, Viner, and Hoffman 2019). The alphabet was modified to make it compatible for the Modstrings package.

If modifications are missing, let us know.

List of DNA modifications supported by ModDNAString objects.
modification short name nomenclature orig. base abbreviation
